column1: We watched this yesterday and the amount of cuts in any action sequence was legit hard on the eyes. Awful movie. https://t.co/GPI8Zd90Wm

I watched the first show and made a comment to my family that I was glad Costner had stayed out of politics and that it was nice for a change to have an actor that was decent and made some decent movies. I have now deleted that recording of Yellowstone from my DVR lineup. https://t.co/xOuQkiUjF2
RT @ChiggityChives: The Devil works hard, but Tom Holland works harder. https://t.co/otv594l9bT
